pullrequest.title: Adds alternative clock support to the log::Recorder class

content.raw:
Thanks for the review @caguero ! Changelog updated, comments addressed.

As for the motivation, the idea was to allow alternative clock sources during log recording. If what's being logged is a simulation, this enables simulation time usage when timestamp'ing logged messages. But I think the abstraction is general enough to withstand reuse in other parts of the `ign-transport` ecosystem, and that's why the `Clock` class family lives in `ignition::transport` \(instead of `ignition::transport::log`\).
